name: Low Ping High Pong
description:
You're trapped in an insane asylum. The only way out? A crazy game of pong.

lol thats not actually the story the background just sux

Welcome to Low Ping High Pong, a game created by me to test my knowledge in Gamemaker 2. I'm actually really proud of how this came out.

Your goal is to just play pong. That's it. Instructions included.

Okay, in all seriousness, this was just a test creation to fully understand Gamemaker. Now, I feel like I've learned a lot from this experience, and I'm ready to develop my actual game. If you want information on THAT, be sure to stay tuned! Thanks so much for playing my shitty pong game btw. You're epic. :)
